title: 820-3662 (A1398 2014) - boots only if the battery is disconnected
message:
The only visible damage on the MLB was near the TPS. 
Fixed it, but the device doesn't boot when the battery is connected. Once you disconnect the battery, it works fine.
Also, tested with a new battery, no go.

No idea where to start from, please help me.
[ATTACH type="full" align="left" width="345px"]60040[/ATTACH]

title: 820-3662 (A1398 2014) - boots only if the battery is disconnected
message:
Check if starts in SMC bypass mode.

Post exact PPBUS_G3H voltage w/ and w/o battery connected.
Be sure Q7130 is not shorted.

title: 820-3662 (A1398 2014) - boots only if the battery is disconnected
message: I don't know if it is silly to ask, but how perform SMC bypass?

title: 820-3662 (A1398 2014) - boots only if the battery is disconnected
message:
Same issue on my 820-3662-a

PPBUS_G3H voltage w/o battery 12.60v

PPBUS_G3H voltage w/o adpter
 11.90v(showing battery voltage)

Q7130 is not shorted.
And i already changed u7100, bios
